item.title: Monster Death Messages
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Alright, I want to make a message like Dodian has for an NPC named SlashBash.

His code is 2060.

I want it to say “Slashbash has been slain by ( player name), (player cb lvl). Prepare for a WOOT if he gets the ss drop!”

Can anyone give me a code and where I can put it? Even if you can give me the Devolution/Dodian, whatever, code for that and tell me where to put it, instead of making the code for SlashBash for me.

Sorry if that made no sense.

Also, I tried putting a messagetoall under codes like this from All-Stars GodSword Mini -

[code] }
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1021) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

                            ppl.teleportToX = 2660;
                            ppl.teleportToY = 4839;[/code]

I dont really know where it goes. Any help PLEASE?

Read full topic
